keyword: how many calories in 5 oz of chicken breast
title: How Many Calories in 5 oz Chicken Breast?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in 5 oz of chicken breast, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown, and preparation tweaks for accurate tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in 5 oz Chicken Breast?
assumptions: Skinless, boneless chicken breast, cooked (roasted or grilled), no sauce/oil added; 5 oz ≈ 142 g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, cut, cooking method, seasoning, water content, and measurement; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 5 oz cooked, skinless chicken breast has ~234 kcal and ~44 g protein.

label_note: Totals are scaled from the per-100 g basis and mirror Nutrition Facts fields.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp olive oil per 100 g
Breaded and fried (adds ~20 g breadcrumbs per 100 g)

faqs.q: How many calories are in 5 oz of cooked chicken breast?
faqs.a: About 234 kcal for 5 oz (≈142 g) skinless, cooked chicken breast.

faqs.q: How much protein in 5 oz chicken breast?
faqs.a: Roughly 44 g protein, making it a high-protein, low-carb option.

faqs.q: Are these values for raw or cooked chicken breast?
faqs.a: Cooked weight. Raw 5 oz would cook down to about 3.75 oz, with similar nutrients but adjusted for moisture loss.

faqs.q: What affects calories in chicken breast the most?
faqs.a: Skin, added oils, breading, sauces, or marinades can increase calories significantly.

faqs.q: Calories per ounce of chicken breast?
faqs.a: Approximately 47 kcal per oz for cooked, skinless chicken breast.
